fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
goals__remit: Le cabinet Rivington accompagne ses clients à travers la conception de stratégies de communication d’influence appropriées, élaborées en vue de sensibiliser les décideurs à leurs problématiques et de faire partager leurs aspirations à des publics ciblés, afin que leurs messages soient diffusés efficacement.
